DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study use functional MRI ( fMRI ) measure brain connectivity middle-aged individual different level body fat . The ultimate goal research develop early diagnostic tool Alzheimer 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Mid-Life Adiposity Functional Brain Connectivity
DOC.detailed_description: Participants one visit : - Blood draw - Body composition scan - Cognitive screen - Neurological exam - MRI scan The visit take approximately 3 hour .
DOC.criteria: 4565 year age Normal memory Righthanded General good physical health History stroke neurological disease Seizures head injury loss consciousness within last five year Ferrous ( magnetic ) electronic implant ( due magnet MRI scanner ) Claustrophobia More detailed inclusion/exclusion criterion must meet order qualify study . The study coordinator determine eligibility .
